title: Two bedroom apartment in small brick brownstone
map_address: Park Vale Avenue near Glenville Avenue
posting_body: ['First ad.', 'Two-bedroom apartment in a small brick building on a quiet one-way street near Harvard Avenue.', 'Hardwood floors, updated kitchen, ceiling fan on the third floor.', 'One two-bedroom $2500  for 9/1, spacious larger two bedroom $2600.', 'One block walk to either T (green line) or 57 bus to Boston.', 'Updated kitchen and bath.', 'An app-operated laundry in the basement of the building.', 'Easy resident and visitor parking on the street.', 'The rental fee is one month.', 'Pictures are available on request.', 'Email, call, or text with any questions.', 'Sorry, no undergraduates.']
